ygData.subject: Re: Problems setting up hyperNEAT 2.6
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, In more recent versions of boost, uniform_smallint was deprecated, replace it with uniform_int.

Hey,

In more recent versions of boost, uniform_smallint was deprecated, re=
place it with uniform_int.

...> wrote:
